field.name: IRQMAP
field.description: Interrupt Mapping, Each set bit represents the interrupt number that will be passed to interrupt controller. It is allowed to set more than one bit.

field.name: UNLOCK_KEY
field.description: Write Unlock Key, Write unlock key value to allow write to a single module register.

field.name: PLL_FAIL
field.description: PLL Generator Fail, Bit is set if external PLL generator encountered unexpected error.

field.name: XTAL_CORE_FAIL
field.description: External XTAL Oscillator Fail, Bit is set if external XTAL oscillator encountered unexpected error.

field.name: XTAL_RTC_FAIL
field.description: External 32kHz XTAL Oscillator Fail, Bit is set if external 32kHz XTAL oscillator encountered unexpected error.

field.name: TEST1
field.description: Test pin to bypass self-timed circuit

field.name: RME
field.description: Read Margin Enable., '0' - Internal settings, '1' - External settings

field.name: RM
field.description: Read Margin., '0' - VDDMIN, '1' - SLOW, '2' - DEFAULT, '3' - FAST

field.name: RC_RTC_VAL
field.description: FLL Calibration Value, Calibration value of internal FLL 32kHz RTC RC generator.

field.name: RC_RTC_RDY
field.description: FLL Calibration Ready, Calibration value of internal FLL 32kHz RTC RC generator is ready.

field.name: CLK_RTC_SEL
field.description: 32kHz RTC Clock Source, '0' - Internal RC oscillator, '1' - External XTAL oscillator

field.name: RC_RTC_VAL_SRC
field.description: Select source of RC oscillator frequency trimming value, '0' - Flash, '1' - configuration register

field.name: RC_RTC_VAL
field.description: 32 kHz RC Oscillator Calibration Value, Calibration value of internal 32 kHz RC generator.

field.name: RC_RTC_CAL
field.description: FLL Calibration Enable, Enable calibration of internal FLL 32kHz RTC RC generator.

field.name: LOCK_OV
field.description: XTAL Lock Overdrive

field.name: XTAL_RTC_SEL
field.description: Select External XTAL as RTC Clock Source, Informative only to generate interrupt on XTAL fail., '0' - Internal RC oscillator, '1' - External XTAL oscillator

field.name: XTAL_RTC_TEST
field.description: External XTAL Fail Test Input, Set this bit to simulate XTAL fail.

field.name: XTAL_LOCK_OV
field.description: XTAL Lock Overdrive

field.name: CORE_XTAL_SCALE
field.description: XTAL Frequency Scaling for CORE., Maximum value of scale is 6.

field.name: GNSSAFE_XTAL_SCALE
field.description: XTAL Frequency Scaling for GNSSAFE., Maximum value of scale is 6.

field.name: XTAL_SEL
field.description: XTAL Enable, '0' - 2-port XTAL, '1' - 1-port XTAL

field.name: XTAL_EN
field.description: XTAL Enable, '0' - XTAL disabled, '1' - XTAL enabled

field.name: TEST_OUT_EN
field.description: Clock Test Output Enable, '00' - test output disabled, '01' - ring oscillator test, '10' - XTAL oscillator test, '11' - PLL test (frequency divided by 32),

field.name: RC_CORE_VAL_SRC
field.description: Select source of RC oscillator frequency trimming value, '0' - Flash, '1' - configuration register

field.name: RC_CORE_VAL
field.description: 16 MHz RC Osciilator Calibration Value, Calibration value of internal 16MHz RC generator.

field.name: RC_CORE_CAL
field.description: FLL Calibration Enable, Enable calibration of internal FLL 16MHz RC generator.

field.name: CORE_SEL
field.description: Clock Source Selection, '0' - Internal 16MHz RC generator, '1' - External XTAL oscillator, '2' - PLL generator, '3' - RTC 32kHz clock source

field.name: XTAL_CORE_TEST
field.description: External XTAL Fail Test Input, Set this bit to simulate XTAL fail.

field.name: CTRL_FINE_LOAD
field.description: PLL_MCU DCO fine frequency control

field.name: CTRL_LOAD
field.description: PLL MCU control signal load, '1' - load CTRL_PVT and CTRL_FINE, '0' - use internal CTRL

field.name: CTRL_PVT_LOAD
field.description: PLL_MCU DCO PVT frequency control

field.name: LOCK_OV
field.description: Lock detector outpu overdrive

field.name: TEST
field.description: External PLL Fail Test Input, Set this bit to simulate PLL fail.

field.name: N
field.description: PLL Multiplication Factor, The PLL output frequency equals to:.

field.name: REF_SEL
field.description: PLL Reference Clock Source., '0' - Internal 16MHz RC generator, '1' - External XTAL oscillator

field.name: EN
field.description: Enable PLL Loop

field.name: CTRL_FINE
field.description: PLL MCU fine frequency control

field.name: CTRL_PVT
field.description: PLL MCU coarse frequency control

field.name: RC_CORE_VAL
field.description: 16 MHz RC Oscillator Calibration Value, Calibration value of internal 16MHz RC generator.

field.name: RC_CORE_RDY
field.description: 16 MHz RC Oscillator Calibration Ready, Calibration value of internal 16MHz RC generator is ready.

field.name: PLL_LOCK
field.description: State of PLL Lock Indicator

field.name: XTAL_CORE_LOCK
field.description: State of XTAL Lock Indicator

field.name: CLK_CORE_SEL
field.description: Actual Clock Source Selection, In case of error may be different than set in Clock Source Selection Register., '0' - Internal 16MHz RC generator, '1' - External XTAL oscillator, '2' - PLL generator, '3' - RTC 32kHz clock source

field.name: GNSS_OUT_BAND
field.description: Config ADC Test Output Band., '0' - L1 band, '1' - L25 band

field.name: GNSS_AUX_EN
field.description: Enable External AUX ADC Input

field.name: PRESC
field.description: PLL1 clock prescaler, ‘00’ - clock not divided, ‘01’ - clock divided by 2, ‘10’ - clock divided by 4, ‘11’ - clock divided by 8

field.name: EN_BOOST
field.description: PLL1 enable current boost in DCO buffer

field.name: ADC_CLK_DIV
field.description: PLL1 division coefficient control of adc clock frequency divider, '0' - divided by 6, '1' - divided by 8

field.name: LOPCB_EN
field.description: PLL1 allow extarnal LO signal, '1' - PLL1 external LO enabled, '0' - PLL1 external LO disabled

field.name: TEST_EN
field.description: PLL1 test mode, '1' - enable Ip and Qp test

field.name: FCW
field.description: PLL1 Frequency Control Word

field.name: EN
field.description: PLL1 Enable

field.name: GATING
field.description: PLL1 TDC gating configuration

field.name: AMP
field.description: PLL1 DCO amplitude control

field.name: AMP_LOAD
field.description: PLL1 DCO amplitude control signal load, '1' - load AMP, '0' - use internal AMP

field.name: CTRL_PVT
field.description: PLL1 DCO coarse frequency control

field.name: CTRL_FINE
field.description: PLL1 DCO fine frequency control

field.name: CTRL_LOAD
field.description: PLL1 DCO control signal load, '1' - load CTRL_PVT and CTRL_FINE, '0' - use internal CTRL

field.name: PH_VAR
field.description: PLL1 reference clock periods expressed in the number of PLL signal periods

field.name: PHERR
field.description: PLL1 phase error signal

field.name: LOCK
field.description: PLL1 lock signal, '1' - PLL1 locked, '0' - PLL1 not locked

field.name: Tv
field.description: PLL1 signal period expressed in the number of TDC delay cells

field.name: AMP
field.description: PLL1 DCO coarse frequency control

field.name: AMP_LOW
field.description: PLL1 DCO amplitude status, '1' - amplitude low

field.name: CTRL_PVT
field.description: PLL1 DCO coarse frequency control

field.name: CTRL_FINE
field.description: PLL1 DCO fine frequency control

field.description: PLL1 clock prescaler, ‘00’ - clock not divided, ‘01’ - clock divided by 2, ‘10’ - clock divided by 4, ‘11’ - clock divided by 8

field.description: PLL25 enable current boost in DCO buffer

field.description: PLL25 division coefficient control of adc clock frequency divider, '0' - divided by 6, '1' - divided by 8

field.description: PLL25 allow extarnal LO signal, '1' - PLL1 external LO enabled, '0' - PLL1 external LO disabled

field.name: IF1_PROBEA_SELECT

field.name: CLK_SEL
field.description: IF1 clock source selection, '00' - PLL1 output clock (PLL1 output frequency divided by 24), '01' - PLL5 output clock (PLL5 output frequency divided by 18), '10' - XTAL, '11' - XTAL

field.name: CLK_CONF
field.description: IF1 clock frequency control, IF1_FREQ = CLK_SRC ? PLL1_OUT_FREQ/24/POWER(2,CLK_CONF) : PLL5_OUT_FREQ/18/POWER(2,CLK_CONF)

field.name: SAH_IBIAS_CTRL
field.description: IF1 sample and hold bias control

field.name: CAL_EN
field.description: IF1 ADC calibration enable

field.description: IF1 sample and hold enable

field.name: ADC_EN
field.description: IF1 ADC enable

field.description: IF1 clock source selection, '00' - PLL1 output clock (PLL1 output frequency divided by 24), '01' - PLL5 output clock (PLL5 output frequency divided by 18), '10' - XTAL, '11' - XTAL

field.name: CLK_CONF
field.description: IF1 clock frequency control, IF1_FREQ = CLK_SRC ? PLL1_OUT_FREQ/24/POWER(2,CLK_CONF) : PLL5_OUT_FREQ/18/POWER(2,CLK_CONF)

field.name: CLEAR
field.description: Clear internal state of the AGC and post-processing channels.

register.name: SPLIT1_CFG_GAIN_CHANGE
register.description: Splitter AFE1 Gain Change Configuration Register

field.name: CNT
field.description: Number of clock cycles between gain updates.

register.name: SPLIT1_CFG_LIMITER
register.description: Splitter AFE1 Limiter Threshold Configuration Register

field.name: THRESHOLD
field.description: Maximal number of extremum samples between gain updates. If threshold exceeded, the analog gain will be decreased.

register.name: SPLIT1_CFG_MANUAL_MODE
register.description: Splitter AFE1 Manual Mode Configuration Register

field.name: PGA2_GAIN
field.description: Set PGA2 gain for AFE1.

field.name: PGA1_GAIN
field.description: Set PGA1 gain for AFE1.

field.name: EN
field.description: Enable gain manual control for AFE1.

field.name: DEC_BY_THREE_EN
field.description: Enable additional decimation by 3

field.name: DEC_SAMPLES_SHIFT
field.description: Number of samples to decimate.

field.name: CARR_MODE
field.description: Carrier removal mode choice.

field.name: CARR_ENABLE
field.description: Enable carrier removal.

field.name: LPF_K_PARAM
field.description: K parameter of a low pass filter in the AGC channel.

field.name: IQ_SAME_GAIN
field.description: Set Q gain on the basis of I gain.

register.name: SPLIT1_L1E1_CFG_CARR_FREQ
register.description: Splitter AFE1 L1E1 Carrier Frequency Configuration Register

field.name: STEP
field.description: Frequency step for the carrier removal block.

register.name: SPLIT1_L1E1_CFG_THRESHOLD_I
register.description: Splitter AFE1 L1E1 Threshold I Configuration Register

field.name: MAX
field.description: Maximal standard deviation for I channel.

field.name: MIN
field.description: Minimal standard deviation for I channel.

register.name: SPLIT1_L1E1_CFG_THRESHOLD_Q
register.description: Splitter AFE1 L1E1 Threshold Q Configuration Register

field.name: MAX
field.description: Maximal standard deviation for Q channel.

field.name: MIN
field.description: Minimal standard deviation for Q channel.

field.name: PWR_UP_P
field.description: GNSS-AFE PM power up indicator, '0' - power down, '1' - power up

field.name: PWR_UP_N
field.description: GNSS-AFE PM power up indicator, '1' - power down, '0' - power up

field.name: PMAFE_BYPASS_POR
field.description: GNSS-AFE PM power on reset bypass

field.name: LDO_ADC_EXT_DECAP
field.description: (IF-ADC) LDO work mode '0' - internal decap mode, '1' - external decap mode

field.name: LDO_IF_EXT_DECAP
field.description: (IF) LDO work mode '0' - internal decap mode, '1' - external decap mode

field.name: LDO_DPLL_EXT_DECAP
field.description: (PLL) digital LDO work mode '0' - internal decap mode, '1' - external decap mode

field.name: LDO_APLL_EXT_DECAP
field.description: (PLL) analog LDO work mode '0' - internal decap mode, '1' - external decap mode

field.name: LDO_RF_EXT_DECAP
field.description: (RF) LDO work mode '0' - internal decap mode, '1' - external decap mode

field.name: RC_FILTER
field.description: GNSS-AFE PM bangap voltage reference RC filter mode, '0' - slow start mode, '1' - fast start mode

field.name: CAL_EN
field.description: Enable PM calibration mode

field.name: TEST_EN
field.description: Enable PM test mode

field.name: LDO_ADC_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM Intermediate Frequency Analog to Digital Converter (IF-ADC) LDO

field.name: LDO_IF_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM Intermediate Frequency (IF) LDO

field.name: LDO_DPLL_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM Phase Locked Loop (PLL) digital LDO

field.name: LDO_APLL_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM Phase Locked Loop (PLL) analog LDO

field.name: LDO_RF_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM radio-frequency (RF) LDO

field.name: VREF_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM voltage reference buffer

field.name: IREF_TRIM_SRC
field.description: Select source of GNSS-AFE PM current reference trimming value, '0' - Flash, '1' - configuration register

field.name: IREF_TRIM
field.description: GNSS-AFE PM current reference trimming

field.name: IREF_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM current reference

field.name: BGVR_TRIM_SRC
field.description: Select source of GNSS-AFE PM bangap voltage reference trimming value, '0' - Flash, '1' - configuration register

field.name: BGVR_TRIM
field.description: GNSS-AFE PM bangap voltage reference trimming

field.name: BGVR_EN
field.description: Enable GNSS-AFE PM bangap voltage reference

field.name: NRST
field.description: GNSS-AFE reset signal, '0' - GNSSAFE in reset state
